text: Khloe Kardashian Vents to Kourtney About Her Feud With BFF Malika Haqq on KUWTK : You Self - Centered Bitch! on Kardashians Looks like there ’ s trouble in paradise for besties Khloe Kardashian and Malika Haqq.
